subject: Cybersecurity
title: The Sony Pictures Hack: Hollywood Under Siege
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Sony Pictures Hack: Hollywood Under Siege.

hook.text: In 2014, hackers wiped Sony Pictures' entire network and leaked unreleased films, emails, and salaries.

buildup.text: The 'Guardians of Peace' demanded Sony cancel The Interview, a comedy about assassinating Kim Jong-un.

discovery.text: Leaked exec emails revealed pay gaps, racism, and Hollywood secrets. The reputational damage was massive.

twist.text: The FBI attributed the attack to North Korea â€” the first time a nation attacked a company over a movie.

climax.text: Sony proved that any organization's dirty laundry is one breach away from being public.

punchline.text: A comedy about a dictator started a real cyberwar.

quiz.question: Who did the FBI attribute the Sony Pictures hack to?
